About Me

Hi! I am a junior web-designer based in Angren, Uzbekistan. I am currently in my senior year at high school, majoring in information technology and economics. I am a passionate learner, a volunteer, and good team player. I have an outgoing character, so i enjoy getting to know people.

I started learning HTML5 and CSS3 on SoloLearn, a platform where beginners learn and get help from the community. Then, in order to get a reasonable grasp of web-design, I bought a course on Udemy; ever since, I have been practising.

I am a bookworn. I read a ver broad range of books in my free time. Moreover, I regularly play chess at Lichess and Chess.com.
